BackstoryDef.title: geki
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] turned heads at religious congregations and festivals with [PAWN_possessive] spectacular display of ritualistic dances. [PAWN_nameDef] always had to be on [PAWN_possessive] feet, and never enjoyed anything that kept [PAWN_objective] sat on a chair, like school.

BackstoryDef.title: carefree hermit
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born, raised and nurtured in the clutches of an isolated forest. [PAWN_possessive] clan believed in living from the fruits of the earth and not concerning [PAWN_objective]self with the shackles of manual labour. Instead, [PAWN_nameDef] was raised to simply enjoy [PAWN_possesive] childhood, napping in the sun’s rays and taking a dip in the hot springs whenever [PAWN_pronoun] felt like it.

BackstoryDef.title: forager
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] created art from found things, such as interestingly patterned rocks, bark and leaves. This childhood of foraging taught [PAWN_nameDef] to excavate, to dive and to sustainably harvest flora for [PAWN_possessive] art projects.

BackstoryDef.title: faunstar
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] earned money as an escort. Fauns were highly sought after by lecherous satyrs, and while many fauns wouldn’t amuse a satyr’s advances, [PAWN_nameDef] did. For a hefty sum of coins, of course. Alongside [PAWN_possessive] job, [PAWN_nameDef] practiced martial arts and fencing.

BackstoryDef.title: climatologist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] studied [PAWN_possessive] planet’s climate through natural and alternative means, such as “speaking” to the local flora. Impressively enough, these “conversations” taught [PAWN_nameDef] to accurately estimate the temperature of something solely by touch, with a miniscule margin of error.

BackstoryDef.title: bacteriologist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] studied grounded and airborne bacteria, and ultimately worked for a much cleaner and healthier future. Or so [PAWN_pronoun] tried. [PAWN_pronoun] was forcibly stationed on a sparsely-populated rimworld to experiment with a highly contagious, yet contained, virus. Negligent actions lead to this virus spreading across the rim like wildfire, with the illness of many weighing on [PAWN_nameDef]’s conscience.

BackstoryDef.title: glimmering faun
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: A psychite-tea-induced trip took [PAWN_nameDef] to another world. In [PAWN_possessive] dream, [PAWN_nameDef] encountered, and helped, a sprightly young dragon to collect fourteen talismans and save the world from an evil overlord. \n\nBut this was just a dream. Right?

BackstoryDef.title: sentinel
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Built like a wall, and just as stoic as one, [PAWN_nameDef] was an odd faun who pledged [PAWN_possessive] life and loyalty to [PAWN_possessive] queen. Many suspected the two were romantically entangled behind the scenes, but [PAWN_nameDef] denied these rumors, and continued to serve the family with dignity and finesse.
